mapper.select: SELECT thedate, starttime, endtime, coursename, vacantseats - COUNT(course_apply.courseno) AS vacantseats, course.courseno AS courseno FROM course LEFT JOIN course_apply ON course.courseno = course_apply.courseno WHERE thedate > now() GROUP BY courseno ORDER BY thedate LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application (name, furigana, mail, sex, birthday, tel, remarks, inpdate) VALUES (#{name}, #{furigana}, #{mail}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{tel}, #{remarks}, CURRENT_DATE())
INSERT INTO course_apply (id_application, courseno, inpdate) VALUES (#{id_application}, #{courseno}, CURRENT_DATE())
